paper.title: SLDNF-resolution with equality

author.org: School of Mathematics, University Walk, Bristol, UK

paper.abstract: The classic results of logic programming are based on an underlying equality relation of syntactic identity. Jaffar, Lassez and Maher [2] have shown how to extend these results, for definite clause programs, to other equality relations. We continue their development by showing how to deal with programs have negative literals in the bodies of clauses. We define an appropriate version of SLDNF-resolution and prove its soundness with respect to a notion of completed logic program.
